TextBlock.Text: MENTH: In conclusion, we escaped safely (as long as we don't encounter something strange at the next warp destination. However, such things are very welcome to Nomai!)
MENTH: I'm not sure you can read the Nomai language, but I'd like to note this anyway: You probably shouldn't end up in the abyss.
MENTH: (Don't you think it's a bit of a joke to put two abyss together?)

MENTH: Still, it's probably your destiny to reach it in the end. That's why we put everything we found back in its original place to avoid making things easier due to our presence. I hope that you will take some time to think about its meaning.

MENTH: Well, the ones that are too heavy will remain the same! Okay, now that the Vessel is ready, it's time to say goodbye. (...Ah, I left all the notes as they were... deleting them goes against the beliefs of the species!)
